In England, in the seven days to 01 August, there were 159,501 new confirmed cases (282.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 July, there were 198,300 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (38,799 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 August is 5,253,181 (9,289.4 cases per 100,000 population).
